thread.title: North Charleston City 3
thread.title_full: Candidates for North Charleston City Council, District 3 - Post and Courier

author: postandcourier.com
title: North Charleston City 3
text:
Russell Coletti Russell Coletti Age: 53
Residence: Northwood Estates
Occupation: Retired Master Sergeant USAF. Operations Manager at FedEx Express
Education: Did not answer
Political experience: Northwood Estates President x 3 years. Architectural Review Board for Northwood Estates x 4 years
Contact information: 843-478-5291, VoteRussColetti@GMail.com , www.RussellColetti.com
 Coaching youth sports and providing positive role model, fishing/shrimping with the family, working on car restoration and doing yard work
 Already working in a capacity as a leader in and around our community and feel that my role has been very successful in addressing and resolving local issues and citizens concerns. Being the voice of the community and resolving concerns and issues brought to me by the citizens I will be representing.
Mark Conway Age: 57
Residence: Northwoods
Occupation: U.S. Post Office
Education: Boston Business School (no degree offered)
Political Experience: None
Contact Information: (843) 532-0781, mconway426@aol.com , democracy.com/mconway4citycouncil
 Spent with family and volunteering in church service
 38 years of leadership in the Navy and the USPS. I have the problem-solving skills and communication skills necessary to listen and fix the many problems that will need my attention.
 Work with and for each individual of District 3 to make this district the best in the city as we work together to help fix those issues important to each individual.
Lathaniel Ford Age: 35
Residence: North Side
Occupation: Real Estate Agent and Pastor
Education: Trident Technical College and Fortune Academy School of Real Estate
 LathanielFord@hotmail.com , (843) 568-0635, www.mrfordcouncilmand3.com
 I usually spend my spare time watching old episodes of “Martin” and spending quality time with my beautiful wife Salita.
 What makes me qualified for this position is my heart to serve the people of my city. My experience in business will also play a major role in helping me to understand what the city needs to continue to and excel.
 1.) Working to combat childhood bullying in the schools located in North Charleston; 2.) Providing tools and information to help small businesses succeed; 3.) Work on easing traffic congestion within my district and the city; 4.) Provide job training opportunities to people in my district to help with job placement.
Virginia W. Jamison Age: Did not answer
Residence: Northwood Estates
Occupation: USAF (retired), Ralph H. Johnson VA Medical Center (retired)
Education: College of Charleston; Community college of Air Force (no degree)
 (843) 553-0885, ladyjamison@yahoo.com ; www.virginiawhitejamison.com
 reading, landscaping, visiting with senior citizens
 Communication skills, knowing the issues, working with community issues over the past years. Time and energy to serve this district. I want to serve.
 Reconciliation efforts for city unity. Infrastructure to include: roads, lighting, draining and public safety.
